name: Final Boss N Co
description:
Final Boss -N- Co About

Final Boss -N- Co is a top down fast paced game where you complete tasks for your bosses boss (the final boss of the company).

you are a spirit and you work for a company called Final Boss -N- CO, one day your boss calls you into their office, they want you to speak to the bosses boss. the bosses boss gives you 5 minutes to complete 5 tasks or your fired but the boss put a time loop on you that loops you back to their office every few seconds.

Controls

W A S D to walk
